Remodeling Sengoku Boost (Player Speed) [ZiT]
C20FD578 00000002
3D80xxxx 9183002C
C0030028 00000000
xxxx = Speed
3EE0 = Slow
3D00 = Very Slow
0000 = Stop
4000 = Fast
4080 = Very Fast

Character Change

Character Change [ZiT]
C20EF30C 00000004
2C1A0000 40820008
386000xx 2C1A0001
40820008 386000yy
7C651B78 00000000
040DD0E8 80BD023C
040DCDFC 80BD023C
0506E8AC 000000zz
1P=xx
2P=yy
Sub=zz

Player
00=Masamune Date
01=Yukimura Sanada
02=Mitsunari Ishida
03=Tokugawa Ieyasu
04=Magoichi Saika
05=Kanbe Kuroda
06=Keiji Maeda
07=Tsuruhime
08=Kotaro Fuma
09=Motochika Chosokabe
0A=Yoshitsugu Otani
0B=Yoshihiro Shimazu
0C=Oichi
0D=Motonari Mori
0E=Tadakatsu Honda
0F=Nobunaga Oda

Enemy
10=Muneshige Tachibana
11=Hideaki Kobayakawa
12=Yoshiaki Mogami
13=Tenkai
14=Kenshin Uesugi
15=Kasuga
16=Sasuke Sarutobi
17=Kojuurou Katakura
18=Matsu
19=Toshiie Maeda
1A=Ujimasa Hojo

Arms Change

1P [ZiT]
0506E854 000000xx

2P [ZiT]
0506E858 000000xx
xx = Arms
00 = Initial
01 = One Stage
02 = Two Stages
03 = Three Stages
04 = Four Stages
05 = Five Stages
06 = MAX

Kill Enemy Codes Activate

Max Money (Z) [Skiller]
040DB290 48000008

Max EXP [Skiller]
040EE1D8 7C040378

Hits Max [Skiller]
040EDF40 901F03A4

Max Kills [Skiller]
043D8740 40810004
043D875C 40810004

Button Activation Addresses ..

Button Activation
808A7D82 = Wii Remote + Nunchuck
808A7DE2 = Classic Controller
Just use http://geckocodes.org/index.php?arsenal=2 put the above info into the address Box . then pick the buttons u want to use .. place on top of codes and E0000000 80008000 below the code and u have a Button activated code
